# Manual calculation of b_i and c_i for y_i = ln(x_i + 1), x_i = i
#
# Formulas:
# b_0 = (y_1 - y_0) / h_0
# b_{i+1} = 2 * (y_{i+1} - y_i) / h_i - b_i
# c_0 = 0
# c_i = (b_i - b_{i-1}) / (2 * h_{i-1})
# (h_i = 1 in this case)
#
# Results:
#
# b_0 = 0.693147180559945
# b_1 = 0.117783035656384
# b_2 = 0.457581109247178
# b_3 = -0.011294006618758
# b_4 = 0.375937120206668
# b_5 = -0.067635760552151
# b_6 = 0.334698545801196
# b_7 = -0.099132474488429
# b_8 = 0.309853505804081
# b_9 = -0.119233146195432
# c_0 = 0.000000000000000
# c_1 = -0.287682072451781
# c_2 = 0.169899036795397
# c_3 = -0.234437557932968
# c_4 = 0.193615563412713
# c_5 = -0.221786440379410
# c_6 = 0.201167153176674
# c_7 = -0.216915510144812
# c_8 = 0.204492990146255
# c_9 = -0.214543325999757
#
i	b_i			c_i
0	0.693147180559945	0.000000000000000
1	0.117783035656384	-0.287682072451781
2	0.457581109247178	0.169899036795397
